scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Nativity. The Virgin Mary, with a halo, is seated on the left, leaning back against a draped curtain. The Christ Child, also with a halo, lies in a manger-like structure. To the right of the manger, a donkey and an ox are visible, their heads turned towards the child. Joseph, with a halo, is seated on the right, his hands clasped. The background features a decorative, swirling pattern resembling foliage, and a patterned border frames the entire scene.
